reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thorne's lectures are engaging and informative. She brings complex concepts to life with real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chang's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive elements would help.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson makes history come alive! His storytelling approach makes even the most obscure events fascinating.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is patient and thorough. Her lab sessions are well-organized and help reinforce lecture material.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Green's course is overly theoretical. More real-world applications would greatly improve the class.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for literature is infectious. Her analysis of texts opens up new perspectives I never considered.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim explains complex concepts clearly. His problem-solving sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Goldstein's lectures are informative but could use more structure. Her assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wright has a gift for making abstract math concepts understandable. His office hours are incredibly helpful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Petrova brings current events into her lectures, making the subject highly relevant and engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are often confusing. He seems to assume too much prior knowledge from students.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's enthusiasm for art is contagious. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson's practical approach to engineering problems is refreshing. His industry experience adds value to the course.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's course content is solid, but her delivery can be monotonous at times. Field trips are a great addition.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Prof. Hassan's lectures are captivating. His multilingual approach brings a unique perspective to language study.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. White's research experience enriches her lectures. The group projects foster great discussions.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Prof. Baker's course feels outdated. More focus on current business trends would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's explanations of complex brain functions are clear and fascinating. Her lab demonstrations are unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: This must be an error. Prof. Turing lived in the early 20th century and couldn't be teaching now.
